Simulate 100 ILI trajectories and corresponding flu sampling and coalescent counts.

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, fig.width=8, fig.height=5}
n = 100
lim = c(0, 51)
flu.Ne = PILAF:::YearlyLogisticTraj
flu.sampNum = 300
ILI.sampNum = 1000
res = PILAF::SimulateILISampCoalCountsN(n, lim, flu.Ne, flu.sampNum, ILI.sampNum)
PILAF::PlotSimulations(res)
```
